mapper.select: SELECT CITY_IDX, COUNTRY_IDX, NAME, ENAME FROM CITY_TB WHERE NAME = #{ depCity }
SELECT CITY_IDX, COUNTRY_IDX, NAME, ENAME FROM CITY_TB WHERE NAME = #{ ariCity }
SELECT AP.AIRPORT_IDX, AP.COUNTRY_IDX, AP.NAME, AP.ENAME, CT.CITY_IDX, CT.NAME, CT.ENAME FROM AIRPORT_TB AP JOIN CITY_TB CT ON AP.COUNTRY_IDX = CT.COUNTRY_IDX WHERE CT.CITY_IDX = #{arg1}
SELECT AP.AIRPORT_IDX, AP.COUNTRY_IDX, AP.NAME, AP.ENAME, CT.CITY_IDX, CT.NAME, CT.ENAME FROM AIRPORT_TB AP JOIN CITY_TB CT ON AP.COUNTRY_IDX = CT.COUNTRY_IDX WHERE CT.CITY_IDX = #{arg1}
SELECT USER_IDX FROM USER_TB WHERE ID = #{ userId }

SELECT AT.AIRPLANE_TIME_IDX, AT.AIRPLANE_IDX, AT.DEPARTURE_LOC, AT.ARRIVAL_LOC, TO_CHAR(AT.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(AT.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE, TO_CHAR(AT.START_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS START_TIME, TO_CHAR(AT.END_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS END_TIME, AP.AIRPLANE_PRICE_IDX, AP.PRICE, AP.PTYPE_IDX, AP.STYPE_IDX, AL.NAME AS AIRLINE_NAME, A.NAME AS AIRPLANE_NAME, CT.NAME AS DEPCITY_NAME, CT2.NAME AS ARRCITY_NAME, CT.ENAME AS DEPCITY_ENAME, CT2.ENAME AS ARRCITY_ENAME, AL.LOGO, CT.COUNTRY_IDX AS COUNTRY_IDX FROM AIRPLANE_TIME_TB AT JOIN AIRPLANE_PRICE_TB AP ON AT.AIRPLANE_TIME_IDX = AP.AIRPLANE_TIME_IDX JOIN AIRPLANE_TB A ON AT.AIRPLANE_IDX = A.AIRPLANE_IDX JOIN CITY_TB CT ON AT.DEPARTURE_LOC = CT.CITY_IDX JOIN CITY2_TB CT2 ON AT.ARRIVAL_LOC = CT2.CITY_IDX JOIN AIRLINE_TB AL ON A.AIRLINE_IDX = AL.AIRLINE_IDX WHERE AT.START_DATE = TO_DATE(#{arg0}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND AT.DEPARTURE_LOC = #{arg1} AND AT.ARRIVAL_LOC = #{arg2} AND AP.STYPE_IDX = #{arg3}

SELECT AT.AIRPLANE_TIME_IDX, AT.AIRPLANE_IDX, AT.DEPARTURE_LOC, AT.ARRIVAL_LOC, TO_CHAR(AT.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(AT.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE, TO_CHAR(AT.START_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS START_TIME, TO_CHAR(AT.END_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS END_TIME, AP.AIRPLANE_PRICE_IDX, AP.PRICE, AP.PTYPE_IDX, AP.STYPE_IDX, AL.NAME AS AIRLINE_NAME, A.NAME AS AIRPLANE_NAME, CT.NAME AS DEPCITY_NAME, CT2.NAME AS ARRCITY_NAME, CT.ENAME AS DEPCITY_ENAME, CT2.ENAME AS ARRCITY_ENAME, AL.LOGO, CT.COUNTRY_IDX AS COUNTRY_IDX FROM AIRPLANE_TIME_TB AT JOIN AIRPLANE_PRICE_TB AP ON AT.AIRPLANE_TIME_IDX = AP.AIRPLANE_TIME_IDX JOIN AIRPLANE_TB A ON AT.AIRPLANE_IDX = A.AIRPLANE_IDX JOIN CITY_TB CT ON AT.DEPARTURE_LOC = CT.CITY_IDX JOIN CITY2_TB CT2 ON AT.ARRIVAL_LOC = CT2.CITY_IDX JOIN AIRLINE_TB AL ON A.AIRLINE_IDX = AL.AIRLINE_IDX WHERE AT.START_DATE = TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND AT.DEPARTURE_LOC = #{departure_loc} AND AT.ARRIVAL_LOC = #{arrival_loc} AND AP.STYPE_IDX = #{stype_idx}
